name: simple-db-viewer
description: Simple database viewer for PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and MongoDB

scripts.start: sh -c 'if [ "${DB_VIEWER:-0}" = "1" ]; then node server.js --host 0.0.0.0; else echo "DB_VIEWER not set to 1; skipping viewer start." >&2; exit 0; fi'
scripts.dev: sh -c 'if [ "${DB_VIEWER:-0}" = "1" ]; then nodemon server.js; else echo "DB_VIEWER not set to 1; skipping viewer dev start." >&2; exit 0; fi'
